DOC.brief_summary: This study multicenter , double blind , active placebo control randomized clinical trial demonstrate superior lipid lower effect Bococizumab ( PF-04950615 ; RN316 ) compare placebo subject statin intolerant .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Clinical Trial Bococizumab ( PF-04950615 ; RN316 ) Subjects Who Are Intolerant Statins
DOC.criteria: Hyperlipidemia Statin Intolerant Fasting LDLC > = 70 mg/dL Fasting TG < = 400 mg/dL Pregnant breastfeeding female Cardiovascular cerebrovascular event procedure within 90 day Severe lifethreatening adverse event past use statin Poorly control hypertension
